case.state: Sure, I'd love to play with you! Games are totally my specialty!
Nothing wrong with a little stripping between people who won't try to kill each other!
I can't wait to meet someone new after losing Firey...
Now, just because I haven't played this kind of card game before doesn't mean I don't totally rule at cards...
I've got to play until I win!
Witch? Oh, we don't have those where I come from, only the occasional ghost.
Oh, I love knives!
Oh my tree, you're so beautiful! And scary. Like Flower!
So... are you Musical Note or something?
So... do you like plants too?
So you're a hedgehog? I love hedgehogs, they're so cute!
I can't wait to challenge this Ann person! Wait, what does persona mean?
Why are you dressed to fight, Annie?
That orange jumpsuit reminds me of someone very special!
I heard elves were all nature-y and stuff...
It's great to meet you, Ayano. Wait, what does yandere mean? Is it a kind of yoylecake?
Cool! I always liked that color coordination.
I never saw why you were killing vampires. I mean, if they just control themselves they don't hurt anything.
Aww! Kitty!
Those are some nice lightning bolts! They remind me of Lightning.
Wait! I remember you! You're kind of like Firey...
That blue kind of makes you look like Teardrop... but you talk.
You have that big hair, AND you clearly like plants from your name?! We could become fast friends!
Boo, you clown.
Animatronics are such cool mechanical minds!
Aww, you're so cute! I could eat you up like yoylecake, hopefully literally!
Ciri? Did you know you had the same name as someone from the Inanimate Insanity dimension?
Clover? You must love plants, like me!
I can't wait for that bunny girl to eat this leaf!
Daisy? Are you and Flower related? I hope you're not as mean as her.
Magic girl, you're like Flower, but prettier!
What? You're real?
I admit it's rare to get a chance to see a princess in the buff!
So, you're obsessed with fries? I also know someone who is! He even calls himself Fries.
Cute AND sexy? I'm down!
Oh, Florina! Your name reminds me of Flower but I'm not scared of you!
I hope Franziska smacks me.
Wow, your face is like an object's face!
Wow, GoGo, you're so coolio!
Who cares about your chest. I want to see your scar!
I normally hate clowns but here's an exception!
Cool knife, Hope! I got to get one of those serrated ones!
You know what they say about what bunnies eat? Let's just say I hope to be rabbit food.
Go ahead with your nibbles!
Ah! Get away, clowny!
Stand? More like "Stand in the place where you live" if you ask me. Yes, I'm an R.E.M. fan. Fight me.
So, are you like magic or something?
Meow meow?
Why, hello, Kamina! You remind me of Firey, because you're hot stuff!
You know, with that power suit, you're almost like a mechanical mind.
Aww, a cute lamb! I'm sure you're quite familiar with eating plants...
Oh my tree, I never knew vampires were real!
You've dressed so warmly! Do you know Ice Cube, or Snowball?
Misty?! Your name sounds like it came from my world!
Why, hello! Are you a lightbulb? I have an alternate universe counterpart who's just a leaf!
You're pink, and a girl? Eraser will be so mad. He always thought pink was manly.
Wow, you look just like Marker! White and purple, that's how he runs things!
Your name sounds familiar! Are you from BFB?
Oh my tree, why are you purple?
Keep it classy, Corrin! Wait, your name sounds like Corn. Do you like plants, too?
I never knew you were real! I thought Firey made you up!
Too bad I can't look at you without thinking of Firey...
I like how your eyes are a leafy green color.
Wow! Such beautiful green eyes!
Wow, your hair's just like mine!
Do you like plants, too?
A robot? I used to compete alongside Roboty... but he never talked to me.
Ooh! A mechanical mind!
You say you're from RWBY. Do you know my friend Ruby? Well, more like sort of acquaintance, but whatever.
You know, weird skin is quite pretty!
Hey! Girls can be a lot of fun! Especially ones like you.
Some people think my world is magical with the recovery centers and all, but it's just high technology.
Well, in my dimension, we each have a certain object which we feel affinity to, selected at birth. But humans from other dimensions are so boring!
Those arms are so fancy!
Oh my tree, is that a Leafy imposter? Are you Evil Leafy? Get out!
Okay, just because I love leaves doesn't mean I want to go here. There may be Evil Leafy!
This place is so relaxing!
Ooh! I once had this bookworm friend who we would all slap when we passed a library in the van! Even her name was Book.
Well, leaves do need their water.
Oh my tree, do they really expect me to strip in front of everyone?!
What? This is a total clambake! I'm so excited to share this table with all these ladies!
Why am I the only girl here?
Hmm, I may get to meet a guy who lives up to my high standards, set by Firey!
Ha! You'll have to work hard to fight for me!
Okay, now let's get started.
I know games quite well. I was second place on BFDI, you know.
You better beleaf it!
I better win this, even if this is for something less important than a luxurious island.
This should be easy. It's just a card game!
So, ready to lose?
Let's do this! I choose ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~
Okay, I pick ~cards.text~.
Out of the options, ~cards.text~ seems the best.
Hmm... I can't say 15, like the die did, so I pick ~cards.text~.
I'll take ~cards.text~ for 1000, please.
Looks like ~cards.text~ will be going back!
Hmm... aha! ~cards~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~, come on back! You can be exchanged!
Oh, ~cards.text~ it is.
Hmm, ~cards.text~ will be eliminated, and ~cards.text~ will join my hand!
Time to put ~cards.text~ ~cards.ifPlural(cards|card)~ back in!
Let's see, I have the best chance if I return ~cards.text~...
Out of the options left, ~cards.text~ seems the best.
Hmm, ~cards.text~ will help me win.
~cards~ cards! Now!
Gimme ~cards~.
That's great! It starts with a good hand.
I must be a lucky leaf!
Yoy!
You're looking at a winner!
If I lose with a hand like this, I'm gonna get so upset!
Try getting past this!
Well, I'm still in this and making it happen!
You won't be seeing more of THIS girl anytime soon!
I have the Dream Island of hands!
I'm so in it to win it!
Oh my tree, I love my hand this round!
Yes... I probably won't take off anything more!
Get ready to strip for the leaf!
This is gonna be good!
Wonderful!
Hooray!
Well, I guess it all works out!
You're gonna read it and weep!
Finally some luck!
If I get one more hand like this, it's over for you!
I'm so close to losing, but I made it out!
I guess I'll take it.
Hmm, I'm okay with that.
It seems like I have a fair chance!
I've won with worse... but I've also lost with better.
Hmm... that should do.
It's fine, I guess.
I am okay with this.
My hand will provide a fair challenge but not be too hard to beat, just how I like it.
Quite the boring hand... but at least it's not too likely to lose!
I've won with less...
That's not good. But it's not bad either.
Being the best doesn't matter as long as I'm not dead last!
I'll do fine.
I don't feel that bad about things.
Oh no! My cards don't like me!
Are there alliances in this game? I could use one right about now.
That's too bad. I was hoping for something better.
Well, at least it will work out for you!
So, what do you have to say to a trade?
It may be better just to sit this one out...
I hope I don't face elimination!
I gotta think of a plan to get out of this!
Well, maybe they had worse hands.
Please don't let me lose this!
Well, too bad for me.
What? No!
Now, I don't really mind taking more off, but losing hurts!
Aah! What?
This is gonna be interesting... in a bad way.
Just send me to the Tiny Loser Chamber...
It's the end of this game as I know it... it's the end of this game as I know it... it's the end of this game as I know it...
Sounds delicious!
I'm still missing my literal old flame, so they have to understand that first...
Wow, Muffins, you sure have some nice Bubbles!
I gotta get me one of those mechanical minds! The only one I was around never helped me...
Oh my tree, is that Cloudy?! We shared a team back in BFB!
Oh, I don't need any heroes when my niceness level is astronomical.
I'd really like to introduce that rod to my special places. It would almost be like having Firey back...
Well, you have three options. You could suck my milk, drink my leaf juice, or I could just bring the bottle of Firey's stuff I saved.
Hmm... you don't look like any monster I know.
I'm glad you asked! Well, my favorite thing about Earth is the plants, and the fact that everyone is named for their favorite object!
Why, of course I'll do it for you, cutie!
Hmm, I could probably use my plant powers to help Mejare! But there's a price to pay! Please come with me after the game for some leafy fun!
I mean, of course I'll take something off for you. You seem to have it hard enough as it is!
Ah! I love girls! I wish there were girls back in my world who loved me back...
Well, you are a mechanical mind, but can it, boot boy.
Whatever. Guess I have to respect the big, dumb battleaxe.
Whatever you say, rifle babe!
Oh, fine, beach bod!
Okay, but you're wearing more purple than Marker on a bad day!
I may be stripping, but you're still a dum-dum, Ami!
At least I actually try, so-called Angie.
The only thing worse than having to strip is your forehead.
What did you say? I'm a skilled reality show contestant!
You really call yourself a goddess, whatever that is?
Aww, of course I can win! Lose that color scheme first!
Wait, judge? Does this have to be a courtroom? Is it not enough that it's a game?
You don't talk? So like Teardrop.
You act like you're so strong, but the bigger they are, the harder they fall.
Ah, I'm quite scared now actually.
Why be so negative? There's a life out there to enjoy, so enjoy it!
Aww, yeah! You're so nice!
I better get away before Elaine stabs me!
I'd do anything for someone as nice as you, Elizabeth!
You think I'm a fast runner? Like Needle?
Wow, Estelle, you're so beautiful!
Wait, Valentine, you just wanted to play with me so you could crap on me!
Wait, Futaba, can you hack me next?
Well, you are pretty neat, Haru!
You were always smarter than me, just like Golf Ball.
Why have Naruto when you can have this lovely leaf?
Ini, you're cute! What a relief!
And a blah blah whatever to you, too.
Oh, Jura! Tell me what you want!
Seriously, Juri, why do you have to be such a dolt?
Kim, I really look up to you!
I'm quite scared now. I mean, really.
In your pokey-man world, water may hate plants, but in my real world, they go hand in hand! I even had a friend named Bubble.
Looks like I'll take something off.
I guess I'll take it.
Well, my outfit may be getting smaller, but I'm still the best player ever!
Ya really think this will affect me?

state.text: And I was doing so well!

case.state: Hmm... next it's gonna be time to get out of these shoes. Nice!
Well, I'm doing fine at least!
My outfit may be getting smaller, but I'm still the best leaf ever!

Well, I'm still in first! But what does that mean anymore?
If this is winning, then I sure don't want to lose!
Bye-bye...
I guess things are looking down.
Well, it's time to strip.
You win some, you lose some!
Hmm... what should I remove?

Hmm, first to go... my earrings.
Aw, let's see what happens...
I'm gonna just keep going.

Well, at least I still have my stockings...
I can stay in this, just you wait!

I can't believe this isn't working for me.
Bye-bye...
Aw, great.

I hope losing this game isn't like losing Dream Island!

Help me, Pin! Oh wait...
Uh-oh!
I hope I can get out of this, like I got out of eternal algebra class!

What?! Losing? I don't want to go to EXIT again! Oh wait, wrong game.
Bye-bye...
Oh no!
I could really use a Leafy Recovery Center now...
Thanks for the vote of confidence, Blake! Doesn't change that I'm losing, but at least you'll love these!
I wish you were a creep so I could get some action around here.
If you're talking about my losing position, I agree. If you're talking about me shedding my last leaf, I don't mind.
Ooh, a photoset! We could call it "Catnippled Pussies" and win a whole kitty full of green! The jokes write themselves.
Eat all you want. You sure won't win against me.
Sure didn't protect me from my friend Icy trying to kill me...
Well, male chests are unfairly allowed in more places, so I'm not sure how much of a comparison it is...
Well, I'd love to show my breasts to you in particular, Alipheese!
Oh no! This can't be happening!
I actually don't mind showing off, but this is a game, so you'll have to earn it! No paper slip bribery either.
Well, earrings are as good as anything to take off first!
Don't even think about keeping these as a souvenir. Unless you're gonna make them wet.

At least I don't need my shoes, like Flower needed her non-slip shoes so ha.
It's kinda gonna feel nice being out of these.

Now I'll take off my sweater...
That's fine. My sweater was getting hot anyway.

I hope you love these boobs!

Looks like fall came early!

OMG, I have to show my pussy now! Oh, well.
Well, I guess it's time for what they call "The Reveal"!
I'm finally ready to show my pussy to the world, or at least ~player~...
No, say anything you want about these, just don't ignore them!
Enjoy it. ENJOY IT!
Don't knock them until you try them. Please try them!
Blake, why can't it go well between us?
Oh... you were... joking... too... guess I'll never have enough money to buy the map to Dream Island...
It did... I used to be in love with this huge pyromaniac named Firey, and it's a long story.
I know they don't look as great, but I'd rather be mistaken for a boy than have back pain!
Together we can overcome any challenge! Or we would be able to, if this game allowed alliances!
I am so not jealous of you. At least my back doesn't hurt, and I can use the boy's room when the ladies' is out of order!
Hey! Don't be messing with my nature gimmick!
You like seeing my babies?
Kind of feels weird what guys think of these, but whatever!
That's too bad...
Already? Grr!
Not like I needed my earrings anyway, so ha!
I'm still in it to win it!
So my shoes came off. Whatever. I'm not Flower.
I'm still in this anyway!
Oh, well.
Hey, anyone wanna buy my stockings? They're only 70,000 payments of $70,000!

This is the last you'll ever see of a "decent" me this game!
Oh. Now I'll have to take off the big stuff. Oh, well.
I'm only wearing this to draw out the game, not for comfort or anything.
Normally I'd show my boobs to anyone who asks, but this is a competition!
What?! I can't believe I'm down to this!
I wish Firey was here to see me like this! Maybe ~player~ will do, though.
